attributes.action: make recycling of ALL recyclable products COMPULSORY across ALL Local Councils in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instead of blaming the general population for not making enough effort and letting Councils slack off by only collecting fortnightly, put the ball back in the Councils' corner and force them to make an effort. Runnymede Council for examle don't recycle cardboard!!! Others don't operate recyclyng facilities at all. Why? Make them all recycle everything there is to recycle, and if that doesn't work, then start picking on the poor folk.
